n: Cerveza and Lime Marinade for Shrimp and Fish
des: "This is a tangy marinade for all types of fish and shrimp. It's great for grilling and makes great shrimp for skewers."
ins: Combine the onion, cilantro, jalapeno pepper, garlic, oil, lime juice, beer, tequila, black pepper, and cumin in a blender; blend until smooth. Marinate fish or shrimp in the refrigerator in this marinade up to 2 hours before grilling.
